minifaq.headline: Quick answers
minifaq.subtitle: The most important questions – answered clearly and honestly.

items.a: Yes. No ID documents or PDFs are sent by email. All documents are generated in the admin panel and remain under your control.

items.q: Can I separate studio work and conventions?
items.a: Yes. Using the event/convention mode with its own data capture and separate overview.

items.q: Does it work on smartphones and tablets?
items.a: Yes. Fully web-based and optimized for touch devices – no app installation required.

items.q: Can I generate PDFs again later?
items.a: Yes. The studio can generate, print, or save PDFs at any time from the admin panel.
